title: Swiss UI - Landing Page
objective: Swiss/International style landing page with clean typography, grid layouts, minimal palette, and strong hierarchy.
output: Single HTML file using Tailwind CSS classes.
promptTemplate: Create a Swiss/International style landing page. Use a clean 12-column grid, strong typography, minimal palette, and purposeful white space. Output a single HTML file with Tailwind CSS classes.
rawPrompt: Swiss UI - Create a landing page inspired by Swiss/International design style. Focus on clean typography, grid-based layouts, minimalism, and purposeful use of white space. Use a limited color palette and let the design speak through hierarchy and composition.

title: Glassmorphic UI - Landing Page
objective: Glassmorphic landing page with frosted cards, gradient background, and depth.
output: Single HTML file using Tailwind CSS classes.
promptTemplate: Create a glassmorphic landing page with frosted cards, transparent layers, and a gradient background. Use Tailwind CSS classes and output a single HTML file.
rawPrompt: Glassmorphic UI - Create a glassmorphic landing page using HTML and Tailwind CSS. Use backdrop-blur, transparency, gradient backgrounds, and frosted glass card effects.

title: Neo Brutalism - Landing Page
objective: Neo-brutalist landing page with bold typography, harsh shadows, and thick borders.
output: Single HTML file using Tailwind CSS classes.
promptTemplate: Create a neo-brutalist landing page with bold typography, thick black borders, harsh shadows, and bright contrasting colors. Use Tailwind CSS classes and output a single HTML file.
rawPrompt: Neo Brutalism - Create a neo-brutalist landing page using HTML and Tailwind CSS. Feature bold typography, harsh shadows, bright contrasting colors, thick black borders, and raw, unapologetic design elements.

title: Cyberpunk Aesthetic - Landing Page
objective: Cyberpunk landing page with neon colors, glitch effects, and futuristic typography.
output: Single HTML file using Tailwind CSS classes.
promptTemplate: Create a cyberpunk landing page with neon colors, glitch effects, and futuristic typography on a dark background. Use Tailwind CSS classes and output a single HTML file.
rawPrompt: Cyberpunk Aesthetic - Create a cyberpunk-themed landing page using HTML and Tailwind CSS. Feature neon colors, glitch effects, futuristic typography, dark backgrounds, and high-tech visual elements.

output: Single HTML file using Tailwind CSS classes.

title: Minecraft Clone
objective: Fully functional Minecraft-style voxel game using Three.js.
output: HTML + JS using Three.js.
promptTemplate: Create a Minecraft-style voxel game using Three.js with first-person controls, block placement/destruction, multiple block types, procedural terrain, and a day/night cycle. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: Minecraft Clone - Create a fully functional Minecraft-style voxel game using Three.js. Include first-person controls, block placement and destruction, different block types (grass, dirt, stone, wood), procedural terrain generation, and day/night cycle with dynamic lighting.

title: 3D Earth Model
objective: Interactive 3D Earth globe with textures and popups.
output: HTML + JS using Three.js.
promptTemplate: Build an interactive 3D Earth globe with realistic textures, atmospheric glow, rotation, clickable countries with info popups, orbit controls, and visible latitude/longitude lines. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: 3D Earth Model - Build an interactive 3D Earth globe with realistic textures, atmospheric glow, rotating animation, clickable countries with information popups, orbital camera controls, and visible latitude/longitude lines.

title: 3D Floating UI Components
objective: Futuristic interface with floating 3D cards and parallax.
output: HTML + JS using Three.js.
promptTemplate: Design a futuristic interface with 3D floating cards and parallax depth, hover animations, smooth transitions, and a dynamic camera that responds to interaction. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: 3D Floating UI Components - Design a futuristic interface with 3D floating cards and panels that hover in 3D space. Include depth-based parallax effects, interactive hover animations, smooth transitions between components, and a dynamic camera that responds to user interaction.

title: GTA Web Game
objective: Open-world GTA-style browser game.
output: HTML + JS using Three.js.
promptTemplate: Create an open-world GTA-style game in the browser with a 3D city, drivable vehicles with physics, third-person character controls, mini-map, mission markers, and basic collision detection. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: GTA Web Game - Create an open-world GTA-style game in the browser with a 3D city environment, drivable vehicles with physics, third-person character controls, mini-map navigation, mission markers, and basic collision detection.

title: macOS Clone
objective: Fully functional macOS desktop environment replica.
output: HTML + JS with interactive UI.
promptTemplate: Create a macOS desktop environment replica with dock magnification, draggable/resizable windows, top menu bar with dropdowns, system apps (Finder, System Preferences, Calculator, Notes, Calendar), Spotlight search, notification center, multiple desktops, and Mission Control. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: macOS Clone - Create a fully functional macOS desktop environment replica with a responsive dock that magnifies on hover, draggable and resizable application windows with minimize/maximize/close controls, a top menu bar with working dropdowns (Finder, File, Edit, View), system applications (Finder with file browser, System Preferences, Calculator, Notes, Calendar), Spotlight search functionality, notification center, multiple desktop spaces, right-click context menus, and Mission Control view for managing windows.

title: Video Editor Interface
objective: Professional-grade video editor UI.
output: HTML + JS with interactive UI.
promptTemplate: Build a professional video editing UI with multi-track timeline, drag-and-drop clips, preview panel, media library, effects/transitions, keyframe controls, audio waveform visualization, and export settings. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: Video Editor Interface - Build a professional-grade video editing application with a multi-track timeline supporting video and audio layers, drag-and-drop functionality for clips, a preview panel with playback controls and scrubbing, a media library browser with thumbnail previews, effects and transitions panel with real-time preview, keyframe animation controls, audio waveform visualization, export settings panel, color grading tools, text/title editor, and undo/redo functionality.

title: Photoshop Web Clone
objective: Comprehensive photo editing application.
output: HTML + JS with interactive UI.
promptTemplate: Design a comprehensive photo editing web app with canvas workspace, tools panel, layers panel with blending modes, adjustments panel, filters, color picker, history panel, and keyboard shortcuts. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: Photoshop Web Clone - Design a comprehensive photo editing application featuring a canvas workspace with zoom and pan controls, a complete tools panel (selection tools, brush, eraser, gradient, text, shape tools), layers panel with visibility toggles and blending modes, adjustments panel (brightness, contrast, hue/saturation, curves), filters and effects library, color picker with swatches, history panel showing all actions, toolbar with tool options, right-click context menus, and keyboard shortcuts for common actions.

title: Flight Control Module UI
objective: Aircraft cockpit control interface.
output: HTML + JS with interactive UI.
promptTemplate: Create a sophisticated cockpit UI with PFD (horizon, altitude, airspeed), navigation display with route/waypoints, engine instruments, autopilot controls, radio panel, warning/caution annunciators, and FMS route planning. Output HTML + JS.
rawPrompt: Flight Control Module UI - Create a sophisticated aircraft cockpit control interface with a primary flight display (PFD) showing artificial horizon, altitude indicator, and airspeed indicator, navigation display (ND) with route mapping and waypoints, engine instruments (thrust, fuel flow, temperature gauges), autopilot control panel with altitude hold and heading select, radio communication panel with frequency tuners, warning and caution annunciator panel with color-coded alerts, flight management system (FMS) with route planning, and realistic switch panels with toggles and indicators.
